about_the_game:
In this world full of immortal aura, you are a banished immortal beast with a unique talent for refining medicine. In this world, you and your friends jointly opened a pharmacy and began your leisure life of refining medicine. Here, you will experience the joy of refining medicine and uncover the hidden secrets of Black Cloud Mountain.

[Game Features]

Leisure Medicine Refining Experience: Easy to get started, no need for intense operation, enjoy the fun of refining medicine, and experience the process of becoming a medicine master step by step.

Rich collection of medicinal herbs: Explore the Black Cloud Mountain, collect rare medicinal herbs, unlock more prescriptions, and improve refining skills.

Simulated business elements: Manage your pharmacy, attract customers, expand store size, and become a well-known store.

Deeply ingrained plot: Follow the main storyline, unravel the mystery of the immortal beast being demoted, and discover the story behind Black Cloud Mountain.
